comp3111.webscraper

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • comp3111.webscraper.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class that manage GUI interaction. Please see document about JavaFX for details.
    Author:
    kevinw
